item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398.Rev reflects changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.Revised form requires new applications to complete each category including educ, training & experience.Changes detailed in Encl 2.

item.title: Sixth partial response to FOIA request for documents.Records in App J encl & will be available in PDR.App K records withheld in part (ref FOIA exemptions 7) & App L records completely withheld (ref FOIA exemption 7).
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)
